statements: UPDATE email_tracking SET conversion_tracking = TRUE, utm_source = 'example_source' WHERE email_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111';
UPDATE email_tracking SET utm_medium = 'example_medium', utm_campaign = 'example_campaign' WHERE email_id = '22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222';
UPDATE email_tracking SET utm_source = 'example_source', utm_medium = 'example_medium', conversion_tracking = TRUE WHERE email_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE email_tracking SET utm_campaign = 'example_campaign', email_link = 'example_link', conversion_tracking = FALSE WHERE email_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE email_links SET utm_source='newsletter', utm_medium='email', utm_campaign='special_offer' WHERE email_id = 12345
UPDATE conversions SET conversion_amount=100.50, conversion_date='2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE email_id = 54321
UPDATE email_links SET utm_campaign='SpringSale' WHERE email_id=123 AND utm_source='Newsletter'
UPDATE conversions SET conversion_amount=99.99, conversion_date='2022-05-15 10:00:00' WHERE conversion_id=456 AND email_id=123
UPDATE email_links SET utm_medium = 'social' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE tracked_conversions SET conversion_value = 50.99 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE email_links SET utm_source='example_source', utm_medium='example_medium' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE tracked_conversions SET conversion_value=50.00, conversion_date='2022-05-10' WHERE link_id=2;
UPDATE campaign_links SET utm_source='Facebook', email_link='example@example.com' WHERE link_id=1;
UPDATE click_tracking SET click_timestamp='2022-06-30 10:00:00' WHERE click_id=5;
UPDATE campaign_links SET utm_medium = 'social' WHERE link_id = 1;
UPDATE conversion_attributes SET attribute_value = 'completed' WHERE conversion_id = 1 AND attribute_key = 'status';
UPDATE utm_campaigns SET campaign_name = 'Summer Sale Campaign', utm_source = 'social_media' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE email_clicks SET utm_campaign = 'Spring Sale', click_timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE email_contacts SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE email_address = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE email_clicks SET utm_source = 'example', utm_medium = 'email', utm_campaign = 'summer_sale' WHERE email_id = 123;
